title: Diva Season
description: She’s secretly head-over-heels for her ex-girlfriend. When wedding bells seem inevitable, she’ll pull out all the stops to win her back… Emma thought she could bide her time. Still carrying a torch for her roommate and former flame Alex, the practical NY book editor keeps settling for the occasional drunken hookup with her heart’s desire while pining for more. So when Alex starts dating a classy and well-educated lady who looks to be “The One,” the normally level-headed brunette breaks into a stone-cold panic, and decides that now is the time to finally confess her feelings.She'll do whatever it takes to get Alex back, including sabotage. Will Emma's disastrous schemes blow up in her face... or lead to happily ever after? DIVA SEASON navigates the ups and downs of love and friendship, letting go, and the discovery that sometimes the person you've been looking for is right in front of you.Perfect for fans of IMAGINE ME & YOU, and SHE DRIVES ME CRAZY, this lesbian romance is a new laugh-out-loud comedy of the ups and downs of breakups, makeups, and everything in between.
author: Hannah Dean
